item.title: Henri Milan - Le Grand Blanc: Wine Review
item.description:
Henri Milan - Le Grand Blanc: Wine Review

Bonjour and Howey! In this video I put a spread on and reminisce about a recent trip to France where I met one of my wine heroes... Henri Milan. I also take a look at the 2012 and 2013 vintages of one of his best offerings, Le Grand Blanc AND manage to discuss the benefits of biodynamic wine production.

item.title: English Wine Special - Part 1: Wine and Cycling
item.description:
English Wine Special - Part 1: Wine and Cycling

Howey! In honour of the upcoming English Wine Week, I thought it would be nice to get outside for a change and learn something about what kind of wine our nation is producing. In Part 1 of my English Wine Special, I take the bike up and down Box Hill and end up at Denbies Wine Estate in Dorking, Surrey.

item.title: Chianti & Beaujolais: Wine Guide
item.description:
Chianti & Beaujolais: Wine Guide

Howey! In this episode I take a look at two different types of wine, a nice cheap Chianti and a Fluerie Beaujolais. These are two great food wines, and they go really well with me dinner!

item.title: Austrian Pinot Noir: Wine Review
item.description:
Austrian Pinot Noir: Wine Review

Howey! Here i review one of my all time favourite types of wine, a nice Pinot Noir. This one is from Austria and is delicious. I go through what kinds of foods you can pair it with, what flavour notes you should be looking for and where the wine comes from.

item.title: English Wine Special - Part 2: Denbies Wine Estate
item.description:
English Wine Special - Part 2: Denbies Wine Estate

Howey! In honour of the upcoming English Wine Week, I thought it would be nice to get outside for a change and learn something about what kind of wine our nation is producing. In Part 2 of my English Wine Special, I meet the general manager of the largest wine estate in the UK, Chris White from Denbies.

item.title: English Wine Special - Part 3: Sparkling Wine
item.description:
English Wine Special - Part 3: Sparkling Wine

Howey! In honour of the upcoming English Wine Week, I thought it would be nice to get outside for a change and learn something about what kind of wine our nation is producing. In Part 3 of my English Wine Special, I get down into the cellars at Denbies Wine Estate and taste three very exciting and very different English sparkling wines.

item.title: Champagne Sabreing: Easy Quick Tips
item.description:
Champagne Sabreing: Easy Quick Tips

As part of a new series of quick wine tips, Sean shows you how to open a bottle of wine with a sword... or in this case, a fish slice.

item.title: Tramin Stoan: Wine Review
item.description:
Tramin Stoan: Wine Review

Guten Tag! In this episode I focus on a German-Italian wine from Italy: Tramin Stoan.

item.title: Traphice (Apology) Malbec: Wine Review
item.description:
Traphice (Apology) Malbec: Wine Review

Howey! In this episode I'm drinking a bottle of Malbec that my noisy neighbors brought round for me. I dissect this popular wine and explain a bit about it's history and what you should be looking for when drinking it. Trapiche Pure Malbec 2013, Mendoza, Argentina. (http://www.trapiche.com.ar/)

item.title: Pinot Rosé: Wine Review
item.description:
Pinot Rosé: Wine Review

In this episode we takes a look at some Rosé and explain why it isn't at all poncy. Lucien Crochet - Sancerre Pinot Rosé 2013 Link to the producers' website: http://www.lucien-crochet.fr/
